DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the pilot study is to assess the feasibility of a full randomised, placebo-controlled clinical trial.The aim is to demonstrate that penile shockwave application in patients with erectile dysfunction of vascular origin leads to a greater increase in potency than in the control group.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of the Treatment of Erectile Dysfunction (ED) With Extracorporeal Shockwave Therapy (ESWT)
DOC.criteria: Erectile dysfunction for more than 6 months Informed consent Positive effect of phosphodiesterase type 5 inhibitor (PDE5i) IIEF15 score less than 20 No neurological disease Stable partnership for more than 3 months Age 1875 Total prostatectomy Another reason for ED except for vascular disorder Clinically significant hematological disease Heart stroke, Arrythmia during the last 6 months Cancer during the last 5 years Intake of antiandrogen ED treatment with the last 7 days IIEF score higher than, equal to 20 Previous shockwave treatment
